page.title: 17SHOPPING IN GOREFIELD
page.content: 10 mothers from{Gorefield}completed a questionaire about their shopping habits. They all said that they did their main shopping in nearby{Wisbech. 8 of them shopped once a week; the other 2 made shopping expeditions to town on a twice_weekly basis. The new covered shopping centre in {Peterborough}called{Queensgate}was visited between 2 and 12 times a year by 7 of the women. 3 ladies reported that they had never been there. One mother used the{village shops}often, one lady never used the local shops at all, and the other 8 mothers used them for occasional items. All the women preferred to use the town's shopping facilities, including{Super Key, because they felt that they had a wider choice, and the prices were lower.
